resources.string: Select any party\'s member you want to get details from:
Click on the party\'s image you wish to get members from (fill DB if list is empty):

This is the test Android-app. 

Here it's been implemented a navigation. 

Moreover, here you can go through several Fragments. 
Here and after just a text-placeholder to demonstrate Scroll-view.
